text: RT @ABCWorldNews: NEW FATHER: Bob Conlin, the father who staged date nights outside of his wife’s hospital room, is finally bringing his newborn son home after nearly 90 days in the hospital. @TomLlamasABC reports. https://t.co/eMNKXa0148 https://t.co/GOPHVBzAi8

text: PANDA PARTY: Twin giant pandas Jiajia and Yuanyuan celebrate their first birthday at a breeding center in China's Shaanxi Province. https://t.co/NdB0C5ewvw https://t.co/xU4CnppWXP

text: Two police officers were shot and killed in McAllen, Texas, while responding to a domestic violence call, officials say. https://t.co/YRqVdsN1Nb
